attributes.action: Make sanitary products free in England
attributes.additional_details: Schools and workplaces can occasionally hand out free sanitary products, but it is often far too little. Many other countries have free ones. Please can the government be aware and sensitive of this issue as it is necessary!
attributes.background: Women and girls, especially in period poverty, have an injustice men don't. Sanitary products can be extremely expensive for many! Teenagers feel ashamed and although they can seek support they often are too embarrassed, when it should be free in the first place! We need representation. Now.

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for the price of period products, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Require sanitary products are made available in all public and workplace toilets: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606807
